actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 93-1215.
Measure laid on table in House, S. 3301 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of October 27, 1972 (Public Law 92-578).

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Provides the Pennsylvania Avenue Development Corporation with authority to procure the temporary services of city planners, architects, engineers and other experts. States that no new construction shall be authorized or conducted within the development area until June 30, 1975 except upon certification by the Corporation. Authorizes the additional appropriation of $750,000 for the preparation of the development plan and administrative and operating expenses for fiscal year 1975.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of October 27, 1972 (Public Law 92-578).
